---
title: "HDA Fonts"
---

HDAdvisors uses two fonts: Roboto Slab and Lato Regular. Both are available through Google Fonts.

## Headings

For all headings and subheadings:

[Roboto Slab](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto+Slab)

## Body

For body text and all other uses:

[Lato Regular](https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Lato)
